oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: February return for Captain Thomas Wells' Company, Second West Tennessee Militia
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: February return (or report) for Captain Thomas Wells’ Company in the 2nd West Tennessee Militia (Lt. Col. Leroy Hammons). It signifies how many men were fit for duty.
This regiment helped man the forts scattered throughout the Creek Nation after the conclusion of the Creek War.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Wells, Thomas, -1820; Returns (military reports); Tennessee. Militia
